summary: Male Drow armor (re-texture of Nightingale) worn by high ranking members of a noble family. Based on a description from R.A. Salvatore\'s Dark Elf Trilogy.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first attempt at any sort of modding... re-texturing seemed a simple place to start.

---Description---
This is a retextured set of Nightingale armor made to look like armor worn by Male Drow Nobles from R.A. Salvatore\'s D&D Dark Elf Trilogy. The description in the book is so vague as stating that it is black with accents of red and violet... so I took some creative liberty and made this. The symbol I added is of the drow\'s goddess Lolth. 
I started with the Nightingale Prime armor as a base, but altered it as much as I needed... I suppose I could have just started with the vanilla textures but I\'m lazy and didn\'t want to pull the textures, resorting to the Prime dds files that were just sitting there in my data folder... 
There seems to be some raised areas on the chest from the clothing mesh where the 

I welcome any suggestions for changes/improvements

File credits:
-> Lolth symbol - by Mike Schely from - \"The Forgotten Realms Wiki\" page

-> Nightingale Prime HD - author?? (no longer seems to be on the Nexus... :( 

Installation:
Simply extract the Data folder in the Skyrim folder.
Typically:
C:/Program Files/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim
or
C:/Program Files (x86)/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim
author: Roman Nagy
